title: La Deli by Guidos
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Western, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The heritage building artfully modernized by Buddhist interior designer Moya Mendez is home to this deli/restaurant in downtown Cozumel. On the menu are several vegetarian items: chickpea burger, grilled vegetables chapati, yam, bean and corn crispy tacos, hummus made in-house, and vegan soup.
